phrases: It is time to show off our ODM gear.
Looks like someone was here recently.
That is odd for a place this near the wall.
Some bandits probably used it as a base.
It said Ruins of Utgard Castle on one of the signs.
Who would have thought there was a castle around here?
What the heck does it say?
You are not going to drink it now, are you?
Not at a time like this.
All this contraband to enjoy for ourselves.
Now you are making us sound like the bandits.
You rookies should try to get some rest.
Titans will not be roaming around at this hour,
but the rest of us will take turns keeping watch.
We will leave from here four hours before daybreak.
What if the wall is not actually broken after all?
Where could they be invading from?
Finding the answer to that... is our job for tomorrow.
Maybe it is not nearly as bad as we thought from the start.
There is barely any Titans around here.
If the wall was really broken, that is.
The only group we have really seen was during the initial sighting.
Crushed to sticks and rubble by Titans.
I think they all escaped, so there is that to be thankful for.
The houses and stuff were wrecked, but the villagers made it out safely.
But there was not any of that, so it is the only explanation.
I cannot stop thinking about it...
There was that Titan at my house.
It could not move on its own, but it was lying right on top of my house.
I do not know why, but it reminded me of my mother...
You think your mother might have been that Titan?!
Then how come you are so damn short, huh?
I knew you were pretty stupid, but this is taking it to another level!
If this theory of yours is correct, that means your father had to be a Titan, too.
I was under the impression that you had no interest in women.
And it does not seem like you have interest in guys, either.
I thought I would use this time to scavenge for something that might fill my stomach.
This will probably end up being my last meal.
Were you joking around on purpose?
I would appreciate if you did more of that.
So that he does not keep worrying about his family.
Not that I like herring, but-
I cannot read any of it.
You... are... able to read this language?
Got To be fricking kidding me.
I would be drinking right now if it was not for you!
Get your damn hands away from me!
Those little ones got crushed by the fatty.
Could not you have avoided that without wasting your blades?
That is just how I do things.
You better chalk that one up as an assist.
Go back down and form some sort of barricade.
If you cannot block them, retreat back up here as a last resort.
But that does not mean we will be able to help you though.
I am not sure if we will still be alive if it comes to that.
We have all got to do what we are trained to do.
Give it all we have got till we die!
I will go see how far they have come through!
You guys grab boards or rods or whatever!
Who does he think he is, always taking the most dangerous job?
Yeah, that is a bad habit of his.
But it is not like this old wooden door will keep them out for long.
I will not let it happen!
Bertholdt, we are going to survive and go home.
We are going back to our hometown for sure.
You will just have to take the whole thing!
Looks like that worked out, miraculously.
It is not getting up from that.
All we have is this knife.
Should I cut off its nape?
You will get hurt if it grabs you.
F-For now, let us retreat back upstairs.
There could be more than just one that got inside.
Information Available for Public Disclosure Utgard Castle
It is unknown when this ancient castle turned ruins was built.
The hefty cannons contained within its walls possess substantial defensive power, but for what enemy they were placed here for is anyone's guess.
You are going to jump out the window with it?!
I have got no other choice!
If I can just slice open its jaw...
What will we do if another comes through?
We will not be lucky enough to kill a second one.
Yeah, I am with you there.
We will need a splint and a bandage.
All I have got is this dirty cloth.
My hand got scraped up a bit, too...
Just spit on it or something.
It seems like you are always saving my ass.
Speaking of which, Annie risked her life to save me, too.
I have got to pay you back sometime.
It is the normal thing to do.
I am not so sure about that.
I doubt I could ever be that brave.
Has Reiner always been like this?
In the past, Reiner was more of a warrior.
What do you mean by warrior?
For now, let us try to gather anything useful we can find.
That way when we die, we can do so without regrets.
That is the Scouts for you...
They are on a different level from the other soldiers.
That is mostly it for the big ones.
It is a good thing we have this tower.
We will go check on the recruits!
What the hell is that sound?!
The one that walked off towards the wall!
More than twice the number from earlier!
Their timing is too perfect, like it is part of some strategy.
I get the feeling they have been toying with us from the start.
My gas is all but gone!
This tower will not hold much longer.
I only have a small amount of gas left.
No gas here, and I used up all of my blades.
Those blunt ones the last you have left?
How many did the four of us kill?
I did not have the luxury to count.
I think I did a pretty good job myself.
I wish I could have a drink before I go.
I must have hit my head...
Is that all I have got?
Who the hell drank the rest of this bottle?!
But they are dying in our place!
I will not do it again!
Do we got to wait here now until the tower falls and we get eaten alive?
Is there nothing we can do about it?!
We will be wiped out without even finishing our mission.
If only I had some sort of weapon,
then I could fight and die alongside them.
You are still saying things like that?
Do not you dare use their deaths.
They did not die so you would have an excuse to get yourself killed.
You are not like Conny and the Scouts!
They do not want to die, but you do not even care.
All you want to do is die in a way that makes you seem like a hero.
Give me that knife you had.
What do you want it for?
I am going to fight with this.
I do not even know myself.
You have probably forgotten all about it by now...
But this might be the end, so...
Try to remember... that promise we made training on that snowy mountain.
I have no right to tell you how to live your life.
So actually, this is nothing more than a hope of mine...
I want you... to live a life you are proud of.
Live a life you are proud of.
Leaving Christa and those words behind, Ymir unleashes the power of the Titans.
Between Ymir and Christa is a powerful promise they made in the past.
As Ymir battles and puts her life on the line,
Christa screams out, casting aside the persona she is kept for so long.
